item.title: Cat addiction, cat ownership "causes poverty"? The "cat economy" is being boosted by young people.
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Cats are cute and can be carried around. Nowadays, cats as pets are more and more sought after by young people, cat breeding, go to the cat coffee jerk cat, “cloud sucking cat” has become the daily life of many young people. For cats, the wallet is “thin “. “I may not eat, but the cat must eat well.” “Hard earned living for cat owners.” …… “Cat Slave” They use all kinds of witty passages to ridicule the daily life of cat ownership.
